media.headline: Syndergaard's first pitch
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Thor makes first Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Noah Syndergaard throws his first pitch of the 2017 season on Opening Day at Citi Field

media.headline: Colon's ovation at Citi Field
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Bartolo gets ovation at Citi Field
media.bigblurb: Bartolo Colon gets a standing ovation from Mets fans in his return to Citi Field

media.headline: Syndergaard's first strikeout
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Syndergaard fans Inciarte for first K of '17
media.bigblurb: Noah Syndergaard gets Ender Inciarte to go down swinging for his first strikeout of 2017

media.headline: Teheran's first strikeout
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Teheran fans Reyes for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Julio Teheran gets Jose Reyes looking at strike three for his first strikeout of 2017

media.headline: Phillips' first hit with Braves
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Phillips singles for first hit with Braves
media.bigblurb: Brandon Phillips hits a single to center field for his first hit with the Braves

media.headline: Markakis' leaping catch
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Markakis makes leaping catch over railing
media.bigblurb: Nick Markakis runs down a foul ball off the bat off Yoenis Cespedes and leaps over the railing in foul territory to make the catch

media.headline: Conforto skipped during intros
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Conforto skipped during introductions
media.bigblurb: Michael Conforto is skipped during player introductions on Opening Day, but is later included at the end

media.headline: Piazza talks Opening Day
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Piazza on Opening Day, HOF induction
media.bigblurb: Mike Piazza discusses his Hall Of Fame induction, past Opening Days and speaking to the current Mets team before the game

media.headline: Braves starters introduced
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Braves starters introduced at Citi Field
media.bigblurb: The Braves' starting lineup is introduced before taking on the Mets on Opening Day at Citi Field

media.headline: Mets starting lineup introduced
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Mets starters introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The Mets' starting lineup is introduced prior to hosting the Braves on Opening Day at Citi Field

media.headline: NYPD officer sings anthem
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: NYPD Officer sings national anthem
media.bigblurb: NYPD officer Makiah Brown sings the national anthem before the Mets host the Nationals on Opening Day

media.headline: Fallen first responders honored
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Mets honor fallen first responders
media.bigblurb: The families of NYPD Detective Steven McDonald and FDNY EMT Yadira Arroyo are on hand during the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day

media.headline: Cabrera's RBI single
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Cabrera scores Flores on overturned call
media.bigblurb: Asdrubal Cabrera hits an RBI single to center field, scoring Wilmer Flores following an overturned call in the 7th

media.headline: Granderson's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Granderson drives in Reyes with sac fly
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded and one out in the bottom of the 7th, Curtis Granderson drives a high fly ball to center field and Jose Reyes scores

media.headline: Wright introduced at Citi Field
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: David Wright introduced at Citi Field
media.bigblurb: Mets captain David Wright is introduced before his team hosts the Braves on Opening Day at Citi Field

media.headline: Firefighter sings during stretch
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: FDNY firefighter sings 'God Bless America'
media.bigblurb: FDNY firefighter sings "God Bless America" during the 7th-inning stretch on Opening Day

media.headline: Duda's bases-clearing double
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Duda clears bases with double to center
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded and two outs in the bottom of the 7th, Lucas Duda crushes a double to deep center field to plate three runs

media.headline: Mets booth remembers Bill Webb
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Mets booth remembers the late Bill Webb
media.bigblurb: Gary Cohen, Keith Hernandez and Ron Darling remember the late Bill Webb, an award winning director with FOX and SNY

media.headline: Mets turn two to end game
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Duda nabs Kemp at second for final out
media.bigblurb: Robert Gsellman flips to Lucas Duda and Duda throws to Asdrubal Cabrera to complete the game-ending double play

media.headline: Cabrera plates Flores
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Cabrera scores Flores after overturned call
media.bigblurb: Asdrubal Cabrera hits a single to center field, scoring Wilmer Flores after a replay review overturns the original call in the 7th

media.headline: Teheran strikes out six
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Teheran fans six over six scoreless frames
media.bigblurb: Julio Teheran strikes out six over six shutout innings, allowing four hits and three walks vs. the Mets on Opening Day

media.headline: Thor strikes out seven
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Thor fans seven over six scoreless
media.bigblurb: Noah Syndergaard strikes out seven over six shutout innings, allowing just five hits before exiting with a blister prior to the 7th inning

media.headline: Bruce plates Cabrera with walk
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Bruce draws bases-loaded walk
media.bigblurb: Jay Bruce draws a bases-loaded walk in the bottom of the 7th to bring home Asdrubal Cabrera and extend the Mets' lead to 3-0

media.headline: Freeman's triple to right
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Freeman triples to right in 4th
media.bigblurb: Freddie Freeman crushes the ball over Jay Bruce's head and off the right-field wall, easily reaching third base for a triple

media.headline: Simba greets Cespedes for at-bat
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Fan raises Simba for Cespedes' at-bat
media.bigblurb: As Yoenis Cespedes steps to the plate, a Mets fan raises up a Simba doll as the song from the movie 'The Lion King' is heard at Citi Field

media.headline: Syndergaard's single
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Thor singles to right in the 5th
media.bigblurb: Noah Syndergaard smacks a leadoff single to right field in the bottom of the 5th

media.headline: Collins on Mets' Opening Day win
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Collins on the Mets' 6-0 Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Mets manager Terry Collins discusses the team's Opening Day win and the status of Noah Syndergaard after leaving the game with a blister

media.headline: Cabrera's three-hit game
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Cabrera tallies three hits vs. Braves
media.bigblurb: Asdrubal Cabrera tallies three hits vs. the Braves, going 3-for-5 with an RBI and run scored in the Mets' 6-0 win on Opening Day

media.headline: Syndergaard on getting blister
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Syndergaard discusses his blister
media.bigblurb: Mets pitcher Noah Syndergaard talks about the blister that forced him to exit his Opening Day start after six innings of solid work

media.headline: Syndergaard on scoreless outing
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Syndergaard on his six shutout innings
media.bigblurb: Noah Syndergaard discusses his scoreless outing against the Braves where he struck out seven over six innings

media.headline: Snitker on Opening Day loss
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Snitker discusses 6-0 loss on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Atlanta Braves manager Brian Snitker discusses Noah Syndergaard's effort for the Mets and how a play at the plate changed the game

media.headline: Teheran on his strong outing
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Teheran on his scoreless start vs. Mets
media.bigblurb: Julio Teheran discusses his command during his six innings of scoreless baseball in a no decision against the Mets

media.headline: Recap: ATL 0, NYM 6
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Duda's bases-clearing double lifts Mets
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Lucas Duda hit a bases-clearing double in the 7th to back Noah Syndergaard's six scoreless innings with seven strikeouts

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: ATL@NYM
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: ATL@NYM
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: ATL@NYM
